answers.answer: LOL!!! I will!!!! =)) how's ma'gurl doing today?????miss you BUNCHES!!!
Hey Vsentz  How are you???  How's your levels?

Heeeeeeyyyy girlie!!!!!!!!!!! how are you doing????Well, im just pretty much hanging in there......I've had another bad episode of spotting yesterday, so much I got rushed in the OB's office and he said my cervix was closed....did a pelvic (VERY PAINFUL) and said my uterus was tilted!! (HUHHH????) but he noticed my 'baby maker' was enlarged....(well no sh*t! im pregnant!)....so, it was a little scary.....but i think it stopped today.....(just remains).....and i have not had cramps....so i think im good for now.....I've noticed it's every time i have (tmi) a big O!....=( so, i guess no more bd'ing huh?? lol......booooo!!!Anyway, i am feeling pretty bloated in the belly but still not 'showing'......i guess it's kinda early isn't it? (7w 5d).......still feeling all the symptoms! =)How about you??? any updates???? talk to me girl!!! =)

Oh I'm so freaking happy that you are doing great and you cervix it staying closed......Darn the luck no BDing.....take all the fun out of things.....Well I think I've self diagnoised myself with PCOS I have all the symptoms so I'm definatly going to bring that up Monday in my apt.  I get to get chased by a nurse in a white coat with a needle Monday....heck she might as well have a black hooded coat and a sickle in her hand if you ask me....but anyway when she catches me she will take blood and my Dr. is gonna run tons of tests to see why I MC'd yet again.  But I think I'm 6 DPO and my nipples have been killing me for a week now and I had some nausea this monring could be the weather but I'm being optimisitc......

LOL!!!!! hahahaha now that was funny....!!!!What are the major symptoms girl?? i have like 0 clue of PCOS! I probably could have had it while i was floating in la la land......, is it like irregular cycles, painful intercourse? maaaaan! you know, at the same time that it'd suck to have it (or any other infertility issue), I hope you really find out FOR SURE what it is.....and they can treat you!!!! that way you can actually target something!!!Girl, hang in there, let that nurse get you (still, give her a hard time!! lol) and get some 'juice' out of you.....so they can diagnose you for good!Ya know? the cycle i got my miracle, i started having funny things happen since 6dpo.....i actually had night sweats really bad that night......and then crampy.......and by the time i was like 13 dpo i was already nauseaus!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!! lol.........I am crossing my fingers, toes, eyes.....and yes....LEGS for you ...!!! (dammit! i don't like the last one.......)Keep me posted ok???=))

Hey there momma,were have you been?Glad to see your fine after your big scare.Yes it sucks to not bd :(.I have this great site you can go to & become VIP,make your own page,talk to others who are due around the same time......that way I can see how your doing with out going nuts looking for you..lol.Here it is, see you there,I'm under ADRIANA...http://i-am-pregnant.com/

Oh you better believe I'm gonna give her a hard time but I'm a little over weight so I'll give up soon.....The sypmtoms are:infrequent menstrual periods, no menstrual periods, and/or irregular bleedinginfertility (not able to get pregnant) because of not ovulatingincreased hair growth on the face, chest, stomach, back, thumbs, or toes—acondition called hirsutism (HER-suh-tiz-um)ovarian cystsacne, oily skin, or dandruffweight gain or obesity, usually carrying extra weight around the waistinsulin resistance or type 2 diabeteshigh cholesterolhigh blood pressuremale-pattern baldness or thinning hairpatches of thickened and dark brown or black skin on the neck, arms, breasts, or thighsskin tags, or tiny excess flaps of skin in the armpits or neck areapelvic painanxiety or depression due to appearance and/or infertilitysleep apnea—excessive snoring and times when breathing stops while asleepSh*t I've got all of them but the cysts and that's not been checked and the high cholesterol, and the diabetes......I'm so doomed.

nanis- Girl!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!! como estas comadrita??? y mi sobrinita?? y mis otros sobrinitos???? man! I miss you dammit!!!! lol I went to check out the site, it's so cool!!!!!! i saw how far the little bean must be at this moment....and it just gives me the chills!!!! Is Julie getting cuter and chubbier and more spoiled every day?? BESOTES!!brown eyed- oh girl........I am so sorry to hear you have all that!!!!! man! it's a looooot!!! i do have some of that! including: flaps under arms.....pelvic pain...., anxiety/depression..., but really never thought I could have that....please get checked girl, make sure they test you WELL! and you get the answers you need ok??? please keep me posted and know that I am praying for you sweetie!!! =))

Glad to hear you are doing well after your scare.  Wow you are 7 weeks already time really flies.  Thanks for the help with the OPK's I finally got a line this morning a light one but def. a line.  My temp. also increased so I'm thinking maybe I will o tomorrow?  Well keep us posted on how you are doing....

question: Hey lady!Check your Hi5...i've been mailing you on there.XOXOXOXO
title: VSENTZ
